attributes.action: Mr Cameron to make St Georges Day an Officially Recognised Bank Holiday
attributes.additional_details:
Mr Cameron to make St Georges Day an Officially Recognised Bank Holiday.

As below stated by Mr Cameron.

St George's Day: England's patron saint celebrated across the country - Telegraph

www.telegraph.co.uk

David Cameron says St George’s day has been overlooked ‘for too long’ and the country should celebrate what it is to be English.

This petition I know has been tried before, but I think it's time now that mr Cameron did something for his voters, especially with a General election due. Show the country that he means what he says. My challenge is to get the 100,000 signatures to take this to the commons for debate.

Thank you for your time. John.
